mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(t.`pub_share_pre_fee`,0)),0) FROM tb_mn_order t WHERE t.`tk_status` = '3' and t.adzone_id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(t.`pub_share_pre_fee`,0)),0) FROM tb_mn_order t WHERE t.`tk_status` = '3' and t.adzone_id in
#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
